CustomField.defaultValue:
"This will create a new Graduate Research Examination record in your name. From this record, you can:"+BR()+BR()+
"- Track the progress of your examination" +BR()+ "- Submit your examination forms, such as your Notice of Intention to Submit form" +BR()+BR()+
"Supervisors cannot create a Graduate Research Examination record on behalf of their candidate. If your candidate cannot create the record themselves, please contact exams.grs@latrobe.edu.au." +BR()+BR()
CustomField.label: New Graduate Research Examination
